channel.title: Gold on ossem: a creative space
channel.description: Recent content in Gold on ossem: a creative space

item.title: Main
item.description: May our assets be Protected and true May our purpose and righteousness be Trained on You May our focus and judgment Be swift and resolute May my suchness Be astute May our thanks and gratitude Be plentiful and often May our attitudes Soften May we grow complete and Be replete by Your nod May our castles and lands Flourish in Your method May I know and recognize My limits May we also with humbled eyes Accept Your assigned kismet May our provisions be Continuous and encompassing May I learn to see When I am trespassing

item.title: Sun
item.description: I ask for guidance And correction Direction And fortitude And understanding Clear presence And mind And health Clear message Gentleness Wisdom And rectitude Protection And mercy Supplies And light Consistency And majesty Chords And Lyric Words And calling Home And peace

item.title: Stage
item.description: Allow my equipment and resources To continue uninterrupted And sufficiently Accessible Allow my path and purpose To continue alighted And clearly Presented Allow my words and message To continue guiding And perhaps Inspiring Allow my courage and wonder To continue being And staying Intact Allow my humility and cognizance To continue growth And providing Awareness Allow my calling and discretion To continue wayward And providing Wisdom Allow my supporters and detractors To continue improving And introducing Growth

item.title: Dream
item.description: Kneel to feel Steeled will Encompassing expression Congealed predilection Summoned equilibrium Metallic symposium Knights and valor Cherished Savoir Courtly sunrise Inspiring enterprise Sightly scenes God beams Flickering destiny Dreaming symphony Driven signals Lighted particles Summer peak Calling streak Momentum’s chariot Fasten up Diffused negation Saved nations Praising angels Manna prevails

item.title: Jump
item.description: Thank You for the words They now flow like W A T E R… I ask now for continued W I S D O M in using them… May Your mercy, peace, and direction continue to provide the P A T H for them… May we know Y O U R Majesty A N D praise You accordingly …

item.title: Case
item.description: May Your stories ring clear and May I know which one to use At which time May those who wish to support us Be gainfully rewarded May their contributions be properly Bestowed and invested In manifold May they also be known in Full regard and call May they know their calling here By these words In past, present, and future May those who wish to contribute Continue to have patience May I know them by their words And subsequent actions May Your visions continue to Ring clear and with Heart May I accept and knead them within May You work with me in esteem and honor May Your Court be filled with praise to the end of days

item.title: Sit
item.description: May Your Protectorate be assigned in Full May they be Dutiful and compliant May they be Compensated accordingly May we know the edges Of our Citadel May Evil know Its place Within and without May my words Be crisp and clear May my message Be forthright May You direct me with great Countenance and esteem May I possess great focus And appropriate intensity May your spires Inspire May your towers Empower May we all know You Through our works

item.title: Blade
item.description: May Your will and my will Be in absolute alignment May my success be abundant But not excessive May the rewards feed me and my family My crew, and their families, too May I continue to be treated The way I should be May You in accordance show me The things I need to change May I never go into debt Knowing full well its scourge and burden May my efforts be organic and just Yielding Your essence and prestige May You show me the way towards The way away from Evil May this world know More Light May You bless my endeavors And undertakings May I aspire for the righteous And true May I continue to resolve into You May my health continue to be Excellent and Enduring May the ones I know also partake In such blessings in magnitude May my schedule be Consistent and efficient May my efforts promote and improve My county, state, country And, of course, Your World May the partnerships I form Be legitimate and beneficial May I know the time to Do so May my patience and faith Be strong and resolute Knowing the right and righteous decisions May I recognize the ones that Challenge my efforts And bless them accordingly May all my relationships Know Love and Courtesy May I never have to curtsy

item.title: Join
item.description: May my timing be appropriate and crisp According to Your will May Your animals be swift and decisive Mightily dodging Sofia’s tread May these furry fellas miss us May my braking be prudent and sure May their appropriate signs be taken And understood and received accordingly May these signs never result in any death, injury Or damage May I also be kindly reminded to further Not to partake of the death of animals in my

item.title: Stone
item.description: If I cajole, coerce, condescend, disparage, intimidate Another human spirit in attempt to somehow gain the minds, approval, or liking of others Then I have already lost If respect is not shown in a way that reflects and acknowledges My own self in another person’s bone and skin, Having lived such a life as mine with a completely different set of results and perspective Then I have already lost If I try to dominate the indomitable The fellow wild human spirit that runs as free as Nature Itself with me Then I have already lost If I don’t welcome your contrarian view Which illuminates the side of my prey – our prey that which was yet unseen, unknown, and different to me Then I have already lost If I meet your perceived disrespect With my own in actual intent To prove that I am somehow more “right” or “found” than you Then I have already lost

item.title: Grain
item.description: Cherished Creator, May You create in Us The World that is Yours Within Us We bow now with wow A bow wow for now. In Your breathing essence The stars stir with wonder In Your high esteem We beam a stately seam May Your courtly desires Praise that which is Noble and Pure A high account of Heaven Blessed be our ascent Within Your blessed bough Of might and brow

item.title: Light
item.description: Strung along gilded hopes And dreams and visions of past There is some angel in these eyes (and the Bright) Reigned for days by spells and lies Oh, these broken, jeweled moons No no, it’s far too soon (the move) Yes, I have shed the Dark and the Shadow. And on the Straits, I crucified Her on the gallows Somewhere beyond Golgotha and Gomorrah She hung high and seaside With four others, screaming wide “HOW COULD YOU DO THIS TO ME?
